item.title: Mentioning system
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

go into “index.php” then with your keyboard press “control + a” so you hold control and press the a button. Everything will now be blue or highlighted. After you have it all highlighted press the space bar. Now with your keyboard again press “control + s”. Remember this means hold control and press the s key.

Hope this helps.
